definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: The economy of influence that grips Washington has destroyed Congress's independence.
sentences.chinese: 如今，經濟的影響籠罩在華府，這影響了國會的獨立。

sentences.english: But what of Mrs. Longworth, the celebrated Washington socialite?
sentences.chinese: 但是沃思夫人呢，華府的名流？

sentences.english: Washington seems incapable of fixing America's deeper problems.
sentences.chinese: 華府看似無力解決美國深層次問題。

sentences.english: Since you are so kind, buy you to Wal fu as a workman.
sentences.chinese: 念你一片孝心，就買就到華府做工。

sentences.english: I came from Soochow, I am a little servant in Wah's family.
sentences.chinese: 我原籍蘇州，現任華府伴讀小書僮。

sentences.english: Washington seems incapable of fixing America’s deeper problems.
sentences.chinese: 華府似乎無力解決美國深層次問題。

sentences.english: Continued economic problems may intensify resentment of the Beltway fat cats.
sentences.chinese: 存留的經濟問題或可加劇華府政治權貴對他的嫌怨。

sentences.english: It's understandable that they believe money is corrupting Washington.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲金錢在腐蝕華府，這可以理解。

sentences.english: Mr Penn is the very embodiment of the Washington-business nexus.
sentences.chinese: 潘恩先生切實地體現了華府與商界的關係。

sentences.english: How can we have the 'Spring and Autumn' drawn by Tong Pak Fu?
sentences.chinese: 華府怎麼會有唐伯虎的春樹秋霜圖呢？

sentences.english: Washington seems incapable of fixing Bmerica's deeper problems.
sentences.chinese: 華府看似無力解決美利堅合衆國深條理疑難題目。

sentences.english: Washington has lost its sense of shame.
sentences.chinese: 華府已經喪失了羞恥感。

sentences.english: The answer seems to be that Washington remains deathly afraid of the N-word — nationalization.
sentences.chinese: 表面看，是華府方面擔心不受控制的國有化。

sentences.english: Mr. Takeshita, in the third day of his visit to Washington, has been conciliatory on trade disputes.
sentences.chinese: 竹下先生訪問華府第三天，他對貿易爭執表示軟化。

definition: Washington (name)/George Washington (1732-1799), first US president/Washington, US State/Washington, D.C. (US federal capital)
NATO/abbr. for 北大西洋公約組織|北大西洋公约组织[Bei3 Da4 xi1 Yang2 Gong1 yue1 Zu3 zhi1], North Atlantic Treaty Organization
Chinatown/also called 唐人街[Tang2 ren2 jie1]
